channel.title: Need help!
channel.description: i have successfully added code for juliet to talk in dialoguehandler.java and have spawned juliet in the right place. but when i click talk to nothing happends. the words i coded dont pop up. any help?

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Are there other dialoguess implemented? I can’t help directly as I don’y have a PI source to hand. Try and copy an already existing dialogue (you will need to go to your packets folder and find NpcClickOptionPacketHandler or whatever).

If you can try figure it out for yourself you’ll learn a lot more, more quickly.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @Army123 Army123
item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

so how do i do this?
is it src>server>model>players>actionhandler.java?
if it is what do i put?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

When you click “Talk to Juliet”, this is the first option on a NPC. You need to tell the server that when you click the FIRST_NPC_OPTION packet, specifically Juliet’s ID, you want it to send the first case: dialogue that you have set.

Read full topic
